mapper.select: select id, menu_name, menu_code, `path`, parent_id from sys_menu where delete_flag = 0

select sys_menu.menu_name,sys_menu.icon,sys_menu.`path`,sys_menu.parent_id from sys_user left join sys_user_role on sys_user.user_id=sys_user_role.user_id left join sys_role_menu on sys_user_role.role_id=sys_role_menu.role_id left join sys_menu on sys_role_menu.menu_id=sys_menu.id where sys_user.id=#{id}
